org.omnaest.utils.table
Interface TableAdapterManager<E>

Type Parameters:
E -
All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
TableAdapterManagerImpl
public interface TableAdapterManager<E>
extends Serializable

Manager for any adapter which allows to access a Table from any other type

Author:
Omnaest

rowIndexMap

Map<E,BitSet> rowIndexMap(int columnIndexKey)
Returns a Map backed by the Table which has the elements of the key column as Map keys and the Row index positions econded as BitSet as Map value.

This allows faster Map joins, since you can retrieve multiple row index Maps, make an intersection of all keys within them, and just BitSet.and(BitSet) the results to get all Row index positions with the same values.

Parameters:
columnIndexKey -
Returns:

managedBeanList

<B> List<B> managedBeanList(Class<? extends B> type)
Returns a List of Java beans where the List as well the returned Java beans are backed by the Table. The mapping is done by column titles to property name.

Be aware that this performs very slowly, since the beans are mapped to the columns of the table by proxy instances created on the fly.
A list of 1000 instances can be created and read in about 1-3 seconds.

Parameters:
type -
Returns:
new List adapter instance

beanList

<B> List<B> beanList(Class<? extends B> type)
Returns a List of Java beans which as List is backed by the Table but having independent bean instances.

The mapping is done by column titles to property name.

Parameters:
type -
Returns:
backed List
